data.text: Ma ɔmfa nʼano mfeano no mfe mʼano,
Wʼaduhwam yi hwa a ɛyɛ ahomeka
Fa me kɔ, ma yɛnyɛ ntɛm!
Mebiri deɛ, nanso me ho yɛ fɛ,
Nhwɛ me haa sɛ mebirie enti,
Sɛ wonnim a, mmaa ahoɔfɛfoɔ pa ara no,
Me dɔfoɔ, mede wo toto pɔnkɔ bereɛ
Nsomuadeɛ ama wʼafono ho ayɛ fɛ,
Ɛberɛ a ɔhene te nʼadidi ɛpono ho no,
Me dɔfoɔ ayɛ me sɛ kurobo1.13 Krobo yɛ aduhwam bi a wɔnya firi “balsam” dua a ebi wɔ Etiopia, Ntam Po ne India. Nnipa de yɛ wɔn ho ma wɔn ho yɛ hwam. toa
Me dɔfoɔ ayɛ me sɛ nhwiren boa a ayɛ frɔmm
Me dɔfoɔ, wo ho yɛ fɛ!
Me dɔfoɔ, wo ho yɛ fɛ!
